options.name: Area of Control
options.description: Your Area of Control is increased to a 2 unit radius from your center. This causes your attack of opportunities to trigger against any creature that leaves this area.

options.name: Free Action : Challenge
options.description: Until the Start of your next turn, any Creature within your Area of Control that Attacks a Creature other than you, suffers a 1d4 Penalty to the first Melee or Weapon attack they make on their turn.

options.name: Action [Daily] : Battleshout
options.description: You shout a rallying battle cry and make an Attack with a Melee Weapon. For each hostile creature within your Area of Control, you and all allies within 10 units gain 1d4 Temporary Health that lasts for 1 Minute. If the Melee Attack results in a True Hit, your allies gain 1d6 Temporary Health for each enemy, instead of 1d4.

options.name: Chaos of Battle
options.description: For each hostile creature within your Area of Control, your True Hit threshold is lowered by 1.

options.name: Action : Weapon Storm
options.description: You make a single Melee Attack with a Heavy Weapon against all creatures within your Area of Control. If the Damage from this Attack brings a Creature to 0 Health, your Free Action is refunded.
